solution_line_template: If Jessica's mother would be alive today, ten years later after her death, she would be {mother_age_if_alive_now}, meaning she died at {mother_age_if_alive_now}-{years_later}=<<{mother_age_at_death}={mother_age_at_death}>>{mother_age_at_death}
If Jessica was half her mother's age when her mother died, she was {half_factor}*{mother_age_at_death}={jessica_age_at_mother_death} years old.
Currently, ten years later, Jessica is {years_later}+{jessica_age_at_mother_death}=<<{years_later}+{jessica_age_at_mother_death}={jessica_current_age}>>{jessica_current_age} years old.
